title: India's power consumption dips marginally by 2.3 pc to 119.07 billion units in Dec
description: India's power consumption fell by 2.3% to 119.07 Billion Units (BU) in December, marking its first monthly decline in eight months. The decline was attributed to lower demand for heating equipment, particularly in the north, due to mild winter. In December 2022, power consumption was 121.91 BU, higher than 109.17 BU recorded in the same month a year ago.
